attributes.action: Remove Magid Magid as Lord Mayor of Sheffield.
attributes.additional_details:
Help the people of Sheffield feel proud of their city by getting a mayor that attracts people to the city rather than dividing them due to their political views and disturbing language. A mayor that represents this city well and doesn't make a mockery of the way he dresses for such role in office is needed and someone that isn't in this role just to boost his own ego. 

As a refugee, the British welcomed him with respect and he is doing nothing to give the British people the same mutual respect.
attributes.background: Magid Magid is ruining the heritage of Sheffield and abusing his role as Lord Mayor by making disgraceful comments that do not bring people together. He's branded Donald Trump a 'wasteman' and expressed political views at the Tramlines Festival in Sheffield whilst also using inappropriate language.

rejection.details: The Lord Mayor is elected by Sheffield City Council, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
